inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in black ink: illegible inscription
markings: on back, stamped in green: [PRESA DE COSCIENZA SULLA NATURA / Il lavoro dell'uomo e il mio intervento / (i segni, la materia, il case, ecc.)]; on back, stamped in black: artist's stamp
signed: on back, in black ink: [Mario Giacomelli]
title: Presa de Coscienza Sulla Natura
